title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description:
Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.

NOTES:
OB: When updating the checked state of the table during the Export Zip process, no busy cursor is shown and it takes a long time (30 sec) for the update to complete.
EB: During the Export Zip process, a busy cursor should be shown while updating the checked state of the table. The update should complete in a reasonable amount of time, reducing the delay to a few seconds at most.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Initiate the Export Zip process.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the file types to export.
5. Press OK.
